relating to a proletarian or to the proletariat (= the class of people who do unskilled work): He saw the revolution as part of the international proletarian revolution. The association could no longer meet the needs of the expanding proletarian movement.
More examplesFewer examplesHe was a loyal fighter and a proletarian revolutionary.These countries are truly proletarian.Many were convinced that only a proletarian revolution could remove discrimination.
